title: Trading
paragraph1: Trading can be done in various directions: B2B, B2B2C, C2C, and B2C. Blockchain enables automation, cost-efficiency, and flexibility in today's rigid trading process.

title: Payment & settlement
paragraph1: B2B/ B2C settlement in travel is complex, time-consuming, and costly. Settlement and payment applications in the Camino Network will streamline travel services' booking and paying process and enable worldwide peer-to-peer transactions with extremely fast reconciliation and much lower transaction costs.

title: Token rewards
paragraph1: Token rewards (fungible and non-fungible tokens) are there to incentivize people using various services on the blockchain, such as bookings, reviews, referrals, sharing data, or other incentives.

title: Loyalty
paragraph1: The Camino blockchain offers the possibility for an application to effortlessly build a global or regional loyalty platform to welcome participation across different brands, all in the same network.

title: Wallet rates / Personalized offers
paragraph1: Wallet rates use cases will enable personalization of offers with direct rates from the business/service provider.

title: Digital collectibles
paragraph1: Travelers love collecting things from their trip, such as souvenirs and proof of travel. Therefore, a use case of digital collectibles is very interesting for additional income streams and customer loyalty. It can be adopted in variations.

title: Hotel / roomtype mapping
paragraph1: Non-bookable content, such as reviews and information on the room amenities or view, is essential for the booking decision. This use case provides high personalization of room offers or extra specific room types by allocating a wallet to each room in a hotel.

title: Voucher
paragraph1: Vouchers can easily be added by businesses and redeemed by the user. The setup is simple, just like the implementation in current business models.

title: Climate Compensation
paragraph1: Blockchain helps monitor and report emission reduction trading due to its inherent immutability and transparency characteristics.

title: Token gated access
paragraph1: With an NFT, a unique digital asset, access to events or services can be granted as a utility to the NFTs. Moreover, users can be tracked where they get access and to what time.

title: User generated content
paragraph1: Users can generate content for various services or products on the blockchain and, at the same time, get rewarded. Once a wallet is created for a service, users can send information to this wallet and are incentivized to do so.

title: Contracting / purchasing
paragraph1: With the help of web3 technology, such as smart contracts, the automation and security along the contracting/ purchasing process can be enhanced.

title: Disaster Information
paragraph1: Companies can demonstrate their concern for the safety and well-being of their customers by providing up-to-date information on blockchain technology. Thus the company becomes a trusted resource, letting the customers make informed travel decisions.

title: Reduction of APIâ€™s
paragraph1: The offering and exchange of information get much more accessible, inexpensive, and safer due to the reduced APIs via blockchain.

title: Information services
paragraph1: Blockchain enables traceable information and rewardable reviews. Also, travelers can send their information to a specific wallet, allowing them to review, for example, a particular hotel room.

title: Gamification
paragraph1: Camino offers various possibilities to indulge in gamification of travel services.

title: Travel identity
paragraph1: Self-sovereign-identity will enable travelers to manage and secure their personal shared information, leading to increased economic efficiency and higher protection of personal privacy.

title: Tracking
paragraph1: Using blockchain for tracking means having one single source of truth. This opens up new potentials when it comes to tracking of lost baggages or visitor streams.

title: Interlining
paragraph1: The sale process and customer experience can get more straightforward and enjoyable on Camino as all players are connected.

title: Automated complaint management
paragraph1: Complaint management could be connected to automatization and even compensation on another level.

title: Locking systems
paragraph1: Locking systems can become more efficient and save. A physical key could become a thing of the past.

title: Reviews
paragraph1: Web3 technology enables the customer to actually own and control the created review. The customer could get rewarded for a shared review, and fake reviews could be eliminated.

title: Insurance policies
paragraph1: The existing trust gap between insurance providers and policyholders can get eliminated by automating all processes and trusting the decentralized network. It improves operational efficiency and also enhances the customer experience.
